ComicInfo.Summary:
All issues were published with a November 1997 cover date.First printing. Office of publication: 7645 E. Evans Rd., Suite 6, Scottsdale, AZ 85260.
Nightmare Theater and all associated characters are trademarks owned by Chaos! Comics, Inc. Copyright 1997 Chaos! Comics, Inc. Mr. Mischief & Psychotica copyright 1997 Chaos! Comics, Inc. The Rules copyright 1997 Tom Sniegoski and Kirk Van Wormer. Itchy Peterson: Just Born Lucky I Guess copyright Alan Moore and Val Semeiks. A Life in The Cinema copyright 1997 Mick Garris and Flint Henry, based on a story that originally appeared in the anthology, Silver Scream. Dolly Dearest copyright 1997 Anya Martin and Fauve. Ticket to Terror, Part IV: The Sixties, Corman, Hammer, and the Living Dead copyright 1997 Anya Martin.
